headline: Ask HN: How can I find time to work an a new idea?
description:
I have an idea for a small start-up. I'm not naive, but I believe it stands up to scrutiny. I would need a minimal amount of money to reach proof of concept.

The issue is that I have no time to work on it.

I have a demanding job with weekday average hours of 9am to 11pm and often to 1-2am. The workload is constant during those hours with no downtime.

I also work c. 5-6 hours on the weekend. The rest of the time is dedicated to "normal" activities, like housework, food shopping, some exercise etc.

I consume no social media and watch no TV. I get my news on a 10 min RSS scan.

I could reduce my sleep, but I find less than six hours affects my performance / health.

Unpaid leave / sabbatical is an option, but it would impact my financial situation and I need the salary.

I've progressed the idea a bit, but I need more time without interruptions.

I feel like I'm stuck. While my job is rewarding and well-paid, it doesn't allow time to pursue this idea.

Looking for advice from those that succeeded on a project in a similar situation.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 我怎样才能找到时间来研究一个新的想法？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 我怎樣才能找到時間來研究一個新的想法？
description_zh-Hans:
我有一个关于小型创业的想法。 我并不天真，但我相信它经得起推敲。

问题是我没有时间去做这件事。

我有一份要求很高的工作，工作日的平均工作时间是上午9点到晚上11点，经常到凌晨1点。 在这些时间里，工作量是恒定的，没有停机时间。

我在周末也要工作约5-6小时。 其余的时间则用于正常的活动，如家务、买菜、一些运动等。

我不使用社交媒体，也不看电视。 我通过10分钟的RSS扫描获取新闻。

我可以减少睡眠时间，但我发现少于6小时会影响我的表现/健康。

无薪假期/休假是一个选择，但这将影响我的财务状况，而我需要工资。

我的想法有了一些进展，但我需要更多没有干扰的时间。 虽然我的工作报酬丰厚，但却没有时间去追求这个想法。

希望那些在类似情况下成功完成项目的人给我建议。
